# imageWidth

**Instance Property**

The width of the image associated with the menu item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var imageWidth: CGFloat { get }
```

## Discussion

The width of the image is measured in points. You can associate an image with a menu item using the setImage: method of [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMenuItem].

## Calculating the Size of a Menu Item

- **calcSize()**: Calculates the minimum required width and height of the receiver’s menu item.
- **needsSizing**: A Boolean value indicating whether the size of the menu needs to be calculated.
- **titleWidth**: The width of the menu item’s text, measured in points.
- **keyEquivalentWidth**: The width of the menu item’s key equivalent string.
- **stateImageWidth**: The width of the image used to indicate the state of the menu item.
